meta.prompt: Ultra-realistic photo of an anthropomorphic chili pepper with a glossy red surface, smiling with human teeth and wearing black sunglasses. Surrounded by realistic flames, the pepper is sharply in focus, while the fiery background is slightly blurred. Dramatic lighting, detailed textures, expressive and joyful face, professional studio photography style.
